verses.verse: And Mosheh <WH4872> called <WH7121> <WH8799> all Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, O Yisra'EL <WH3478>, the statutes <WH2706> and judgments <WH4941> which I speak <WH1696> <WH8802> in your ears <WH241> this day <WH3117>, that ye may learn <WH3925> <WH8804> them, and keep <WH8104> <WH8804>, and do <WH6213> <WH8800> them.
The YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> made <WH3772> <WH8804> a covenant <WH1285> with us in Horev <WH2722>.
The YY <WH3068> made <WH3772> <WH8804> not this covenant <WH1285> with our fathers <WH1>, but with us <WH587>, even us, who are all of us <WH428> here alive <WH2416> this day <WH3117>.
The YY <WH3068> talked <WH1696> <WH8765> with you face <WH6440> to face <WH6440> in the mount <WH2022> out of the midst <WH8432> of the fire <WH784>,

(I stood <WH5975> <WH8802> between the YY <WH3068> and you at that time <WH6256>, to shew <WH5046> <WH8687> you the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>: for ye were afraid <WH3372> <WH8804> by reason <WH6440> of the fire <WH784>, and went not up <WH5927> <WH8804> into the mount <WH2022>;) saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
I am the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, which brought thee out <WH3318> <WH8689> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>.
Thou shalt have none other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430> before <WH6440> me.

Thou shalt not make <WH6213> <WH8799> thee any graven image <WH6459>, or any likeness <WH8544> of any thing that is in heaven <WH8064> above <WH4605>, or that is in the earth <WH776> beneath, or that is in the waters <WH4325> beneath the earth <WH776>:

Thou shalt not bow down <WH7812> <WH8691> thyself unto them, nor serve <WH5647> <WH8714> them: for I the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> am a jealous <WH7067> 'Elohim <WH410>, visiting <WH6485> <WH8802> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> upon the children <WH1121> unto the third <WH8029> and fourth <WH7256> generation of them that hate <WH8130> <WH8802> me,
And shewing <WH6213> <WH8802> mercy <WH2617> unto thousands <WH505> of them that love <WH157> <WH8802> me and keep <WH8104> <WH8802> my Mitzvot <WH4687>.

Thou shalt not take <WH5375> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> in vain <WH7723>: for the YY <WH3068> will not hold him guiltless <WH5352> <WH8762> that taketh <WH5375> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> in vain <WH7723>.
Keep <WH8104> <WH8800> the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117> to sanctify <WH6942> <WH8763> it, as the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee.
Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> thou shalt labour <WH5647> <WH8799>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> all thy work <WH4399>:

But the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is the sabbath <WH7676> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>: in it thou shalt not do <WH6213> <WH8799> any work <WH4399>, thou, nor thy son <WH1121>, nor thy daughter <WH1323>, nor thy manservant <WH5650>, nor thy maidservant <WH519>, nor thine ox <WH7794>, nor thine ass <WH2543>, nor any of thy cattle <WH929>, nor thy stranger <WH1616> that is within thy gates <WH8179>; that thy manservant <WH5650> and thy maidservant <WH519> may rest <WH5117> <WH8799> as well as thou.

And remember <WH2142> <WH8804> that thou wast a servant <WH5650> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and that the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> brought <WH3318> <WH8686> thee out thence through a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027> and by a stretched out <WH5186> <WH8803> arm <WH2220>: therefore the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee to keep <WH6213> <WH8800> the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117>.

Honour <WH3513> <WH8761> thy father <WH1> and thy mother <WH517>, as the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee; that thy days <WH3117> may be prolonged <WH748> <WH8686>, and that it may go well <WH3190> <WH8799> with thee, in the land <WH127> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> thee.
Thou shalt not kill <WH7523> <WH8799>.
Neither shalt thou commit adultery <WH5003> <WH8799>.
Neither shalt thou steal <WH1589> <WH8799>.
Neither shalt thou bear <WH6030> <WH8799> false <WH7723> witness <WH5707> against thy neighbour <WH7453>.

Neither shalt thou desire <WH2530> <WH8799> thy neighbour's <WH7453> wife <WH802>, neither shalt thou covet <WH183> <WH8691> thy neighbour's <WH7453> house <WH1004>, his field <WH7704>, or his manservant <WH5650>, or his maidservant <WH519>, his ox <WH7794>, or his ass <WH2543>, or any thing that is thy neighbour's <WH7453>.

These words <WH1697> the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto all your assembly <WH6951> in the mount <WH2022> out of the midst <WH8432> of the fire <WH784>, of the cloud <WH6051>, and of the thick darkness <WH6205>, with a great <WH1419> voice <WH6963>: and he added no more <WH3254> <WH8804>. And he wrote <WH3789> <WH8799> them in two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68>, and delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> them unto me.

And it came to pass, when ye heard <WH8085> <WH8800> the voice <WH6963> out of the midst <WH8432> of the darkness <WH2822>, (for the mountain <WH2022> did burn <WH1197> <WH8802> with fire <WH784>,) that ye came near <WH7126> <WH8799> unto me, even all the heads <WH7218> of your tribes <WH7626>, and your elders <WH2205>;

And ye said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> hath shewed <WH7200> <WH8689> us his glory <WH3519> and his greatness <WH1433>, and we have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> his voice <WH6963> out of the midst <WH8432> of the fire <WH784>: we have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> this day <WH3117> that 'Elohim <WH430> doth talk <WH1696> <WH8762> with man <WH120>, and he liveth <WH2425> <WH8804>.

Now therefore why should we die <WH4191> <WH8799>? for this great <WH1419> fire <WH784> will consume <WH398> <WH8799> us: if we hear <WH8085> <WH8800> the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> any more <WH3254> <WH8802>, then we shall die <WH4191> <WH8804>.

For who is there of all flesh <WH1320>, that hath heard <WH8085> <WH8804> the voice <WH6963> of the living <WH2416> 'Elohim <WH430> speaking <WH1696> <WH8764> out of the midst <WH8432> of the fire <WH784>, as we have, and lived <WH2421> <WH8799> ?

Go thou near <WH7126> <WH8798>, and hear <WH8085> <WH8798> all that the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> shall say <WH559> <WH8799>: and speak <WH1696> <WH8762> thou unto us all that the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> shall speak <WH1696> <WH8762> unto thee; and we will hear <WH8085> <WH8804> it, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> it.

And the YY <WH3068> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> the voice <WH6963> of your words <WH1697>, when ye spake <WH1696> <WH8763> unto me; and the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, I have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> the voice <WH6963> of the words <WH1697> of this people <WH5971>, which they have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> unto thee: they have well <WH3190> <WH8689> said all that they have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>.

O that there were such <WH2088> an <WH4310> heart <WH3824> in them <WH5414> <WH8799>, that they would fear <WH3372> <WH8800> me, and keep <WH8104> <WH8800> all my Mitzvot <WH4687> always <WH3117>, that it might be well <WH3190> <WH8799> with them, and with their children <WH1121> for ever <WH5769> !
Go <WH3212> <WH8798> say <WH559> <WH8798> to them, Get <WH7725> you into your tents <WH168> again <WH7725> <WH8798>.

But as for thee, stand <WH5975> <WH8798> thou here by me <WH5978>, and I will speak <WH1696> <WH8762> unto thee all the Mitzvot <WH4687>, and the statutes <WH2706>, and the judgments <WH4941>, which thou shalt teach <WH3925> <WH8762> them, that they may do <WH6213> <WH8804> them in the land <WH776> which I give <WH5414> <WH8802> them to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it.

Ye shall observe <WH8104> <WH8804> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> therefore as the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> you: ye shall not turn aside <WH5493> <WH8799> to the right hand <WH3225> or to the left <WH8040>.

Ye shall walk <WH3212> <WH8799> in all the ways <WH1870> which the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> you, that ye may live <WH2421> <WH8799>, and that it may be well <WH2895> <WH8804> with you, and that ye may prolong <WH748> <WH8689> your days <WH3117> in the land <WH776> which ye shall possess <WH3423> <WH8799>.
